658250.name: Xtrike
658250.description:
The X army has invaded our territory, we need to fight against them to protect our land, our country and our freedom.

Xtrike


Xtrike is a rogue like integrated with shoot'em up, action real-time strategies game. Players need to produce battle units and also control heroes to destroy incoming enemies.

Game Features


Gameplay:
Xtrike is a shooting game similar to traditional shooting games but also includes tactics.
You'll have a complete arsenal at the beginning of each stage, but you'll need funds to build battle units, while funds increase as time flows. You may increase productivity by investing your funds.
Use arrow keys and AD to control the hero movement, space to jump;
Use mouse and number keys to invest the productivity or build battle units.
